attributes.action: grow some balls, make a decent stand for himself, and at least appear to be a man worthy of leading our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We hear the Prime Minister being attacked left, right and centre by politicians, and all we get in response are stuttered, and occasionally unfounded, retorts. 

Gordon Brown - GROW SOME BALLS - you're the man in charge, you're a decent politician, let us see you willing and strong so you can lead our country forwards.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
